mapper.select: select seqUser, name, birthDate, tel, address from tblUser where id = #{id}
select * from tblVet where address like '%' || #{address} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into tblReservation (seqReservation, seqUser, seqPet, seqHouseType, seqVet, reason, companyName, adoptionExperience, NeutralizationSurgery, availableDate) values(seqReservation.nextVal, #{seqUser}, #{seqPet}, #{seqHouseType}, #{seqVet}, #{reason}, #{companyName}, #{adoptionExperience} , #{neutralizationSurgery}, sysdate)
